allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process | Where-Object { $_Id -eq ''a018f5'' } | Select-Object Id, ProcessName, StartTime")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Magnus - Wheel Strategy Trading Dashboard

Complete trading dashboard with Robinhood & TradingView integration.

Features:
- Dashboard: Portfolio overview with balance forecast
- Opportunities: High-quality wheel strategy opportunities
- Positions: Live option positions from Robinhood
- Premium Scanner: Premium analysis with Greeks
- TradingView Watchlists: Watchlist sync and analysis  
- Database Scan: Bulk options scanning
- Earnings Calendar: Earnings tracking and avoidance
- Calendar Spreads: AI-powered calendar spread analysis
- Settings: Robinhood and TradingView configuration

Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
